00044 //utility class to print run statistics
00045 struct PrintStats{
00046   time_t last_print_time;
00047   unsigned long events_processed;
00048   unsigned long long bytes_processed;
00049   void Clear() { 
00050     last_print_time = time(0); 
00051     events_processed = 0;
00052     bytes_processed = 0;
00053   }
00054   PrintStats() { Clear(); }
00055 };
00056 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const PrintStats& stats){
00057   time_t now = time(0);
00058   out<<"In last "<<now-stats.last_print_time<<" seconds, processed "
00059      <<stats.events_processed<<" events at "
00060      <<stats.bytes_processed/(now-stats.last_print_time)/1024<<" kiB/s";
00061   return out;
00062 }
00063 
00064 //utility class to add real-time spectra
00065 class SpectrumAdder{
00066   AsyncEventHandler* _handler;
00067 public:
00068   SpectrumAdder(AsyncEventHandler* handler) : _handler(handler) {}
00069   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){
00070     //first parameter is the name of the spectrum module
00071     std::string name;
00072     in>>name;
00073     SpectrumMaker* spec = new SpectrumMaker(name);
00074     //expect to read parameters immediately after name
00075     in>>*spec;
00076     //register the spectrum with the event handler
00077     _handler->AddModule(spec);
00078     return in;
00079   }
00080 };
00081

00083 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00084 {
00085   
00086   //set up the config handler
00087   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00088   
00089   //register all processing modules
00090   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00091   //only RawWriter and reading headers go synchronously 
00092   RawWriter* writer = modules->AddModule<RawWriter>();
00093   ConvertData* read_headers = modules->AddModule<ConvertData>("ReadHeaders");
00094   read_headers->SetHeadersOnly(true);
00095   
00096   std::vector<AsyncEventHandler*> async_threads;
00097   
00098   //All analyzing modules run on a single asynchronous thread
00099   AsyncEventHandler thread1;
00100   modules->AddAsyncReceiver(&thread1);
00101   thread1.AddModule(new ConvertData);
00102   thread1.AddModule(new SumChannels);
00103   thread1.AddModule(new BaselineFinder);
00104   thread1.AddModule(new Integrator);
00105   thread1.AddModule(new EvalRois);
00106   async_threads.push_back(&thread1);
00107   // any more advanced functions?
00108   
00109   //ProcessedPlotter and RootGraphix share a thread and refresh speed
00110   AsyncEventHandler thread2;
00111   //add RootGraphix first so dependencies pass, but call afterward...
00112   RootGraphix* rootgraphix = new RootGraphix;
00113   modules->AddModule(rootgraphix, false, true);
00114   thread1.AddReceiver(&thread2);
00115   ProcessedPlotter* plotter = new ProcessedPlotter;
00116   thread2.AddModule(plotter);
00117   thread2.AddModule(new TriggerHistory);
00118   thread2.AddModule(rootgraphix, false);
00119   async_threads.push_back(&thread2);
00120   
00121   //for right now, put the spectra all on one thread
00122   AsyncEventHandler thread3;
00123   thread1.AddReceiver(&thread3);
00124   //have 3 spectra available but disabled by default
00125   SpectrumMaker* spec = new SpectrumMaker("Spectrum1");
00126   spec->enabled = false;
00127   thread3.AddModule(spec);
00128   spec = new SpectrumMaker("Spectrum2");
00129   spec->enabled = false;
00130   thread3.AddModule(spec);
00131   spec = new SpectrumMaker("Spectrum3");
00132   spec->enabled = false;
00133   thread3.AddModule(spec);
00134   
00135   
00136   //this can break stuff, but it can be useful, so keep it for now
00137   modules->RegisterReadFunction("add_spectrum", SpectrumAdder(&thread3),
00138                                 "Add a new real-time spectrum to display");
00139   async_threads.push_back(&thread3);
00140     
00141   //initialize some options for command switches
00142   long stop_events = -1, stop_time = -1; 
00143   long long stop_size = -1;
00144   int stattime=0;
00145   bool write_only = false;
00146   RunDB::runinfo* info = modules->GetRunInfo();
00147   std::string testmode_file="";
00148   int graphics_refresh = 1;
00149   bool require_comment = false;
00150   config->AddCommandSwitch('i', "info", "Set run database info to <info>",
00151                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<RunDB::runinfo>(*info),
00152                            "info");
00153   config->AddCommandSwitch('m',"message","Set database comment to <message>",
00154                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(info->comment),
00155                            "message");
00156                            
00157   config->AddCommandSwitch('e',"stop_events","Stop after <n> events",
00158                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<long>(stop_events),
00159                            "n");
00160   config->AddCommandSwitch('t',"stop_time","Stop after <n> seconds",
00161                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<long>(stop_time),
00162                            "n");
00163   config->AddCommandSwitch('s',"stop_size","Stop after saving <size> MB",
00164                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<long long>(stop_size),
00165                            "size");
00166   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"write-only",
00167                            "Disable all modules except for the RawWriter",
00168                            CommandSwitch::SetValue<bool>(write_only, true));
00169   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"testmode","Fake DAQ from input file <file>",
00170                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>
00171                            (testmode_file) ,"file");
00172   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"stat-time","Print stats every <secs> seconds",
00173                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(stattime),"secs");
00174   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"refresh","Time in s between graphics update",
00175                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(graphics_refresh),
00176                            "secs");
00177   config->RegisterParameter("stop_size",stop_size,
00178                             "Maximum file size in bytes before abort the run");
00179   config->RegisterParameter("stop_time",stop_time,
00180                             "Maximum time in seconds before we abort the run");
00181   config->RegisterParameter("stop_events",stop_events,
00182                             "Maximum number of events before we abort the run");
00183   config->RegisterParameter("stat-time",stattime,
00184                             "Time between printing of event/data rates");
00185   config->RegisterParameter("require_comment", require_comment,
00186                             "Require a runinfo comment for the run to proceed");
00187   
00188   V172X_Daq daq;
00189     
00190   config->SetProgramUsageString("daqman [options]");
00191   config->SetDefaultCfgFile("cfg/daqman.cfg");
00192   config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00193   if(config->GetNCommandArgs()){
00194     Message(ERROR)<<"Too many arguments specified."<<std::endl;
00195     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00196   }
00197   
00198   
00199   if(writer->enabled){
00200     modules->SetRunIDFromFilename(writer->GetFilename());
00201     //only require comment if saving
00202     if(require_comment){
00203       while(info->comment == ""){
00204         //sleep a bit to clear the message queue
00205         boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(100));
00206         std::cout<<"Please enter a descriptive comment for this run:"
00207                  <<std::endl;
00208         std::getline(std::cin, info->comment);
00209       }
00210     }
00211   
00212   }
00213   //see if we want to disable everything
00214   if(write_only){
00215     std::vector<BaseModule*>* mods = modules->GetListOfModules();
00216     for(size_t i=0; i < mods->size(); i++){
00217       if(mods->at(i) != writer) mods->at(i)->enabled = false;
00218     }
00219   }
00220   
00221   //set the graphics refresh time
00222   thread2.SetSleepMillisec(graphics_refresh*1000);
00223   
00224   //see if we're in test mode
00225   Reader* reader = 0;
00226   if(testmode_file!=""){
00227     reader = new Reader(testmode_file);
00228     if(!reader->IsOk()){
00229       Message(ERROR)<<"Testmode specified, but can't load file "
00230                     <<testmode_file<<".\n";
00231       return 1;
00232     }
00233   }
00234   
00235   //set the terminal into unbuffered mode
00236   keyboard board;
00237   //initialize all modules
00238   Message(INFO)<<"Initializing modules...\n";
00239   if(modules->Initialize()){
00240     Message(CRITICAL)<<"Unable to initialize all modules.\n";
00241     return 1;
00242   }
00243   //start up the asynchronous event handlers
00244   for(size_t i=0; i<async_threads.size(); ++i)
00245     async_threads[i]->StartRunning();
00246   try
00247     {
00248       if(!reader){
00249         Message(INFO)<<"Initializing DAQ...\n";
00250         if(daq.Initialize() == 0){
00251           Message(INFO)<<"Starting Run...\n";
00252           daq.StartRun();
00253         }
00254         else{
00255           Message(CRITICAL)<<"Initialization Error!"<<std::endl;
00256           modules->Finalize();
00257           return -1;
00258         }
00259       }
00260       //start the thread which takes commands
00261       time_t start_time = time(0);
00262       long events_downloaded = 0;
00263       long long data_downloaded = 0;
00264       PrintStats stats;
00265       while(!stop_run){
00266         //see if we should end the run
00267         if( (stop_time > 0 && time(0)-start_time >= stop_time) ||
00268             (stop_events > 0 && events_downloaded >= stop_events) ||
00269             (stop_size > 0 && writer->GetBytesWritten()/1000000 >= stop_size) ){
00270           stop_run = true;
00271         }
00272         //process user input
00273         if(board.kbhit()){
00274           //process user entered command
00275           char c = board.getch();
00276           switch(c){
00277           case 'q':
00278           case 'Q':
00279             stop_run = true;
00280             break;
00281           case 'p':
00282           case 'P':
00283             plotter->TogglePause();
00284             break;
00285           default:
00286             Message(ERROR)<<"Unknown control character '"<<c<<"'\n";
00287           };
00288         }
00289         if(stop_run) break;
00290         //get the next event
00291         RawEventPtr evt;
00292         if(reader)
00293           evt = reader->GetNextEvent();
00294         else
00295           evt = daq.GetNextEvent(500000);
00296         if(!evt){
00297           //see if there's an error
00298           if(reader){
00299             Message(INFO)<<"Reached end of file, exiting testmode.\n";
00300             stop_run = true;
00301             break;
00302           }
00303           else if(daq.GetStatus() != BaseDaq::NORMAL){
00304             Message(ERROR)<<"An error occurred while getting next event.\n";
00305             Message(ERROR)<<"Attempting to abort run...\n";
00306             stop_run = true;
00307             break;
00308           }
00309           else{
00310             Message(DEBUG)<<"Waiting for new event ready in memory...\n";
00311             continue;
00312           }
00313         }
00314         if(modules->Process(evt)){
00315           Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered processing event.\n";
00316           //stop_run = true;
00317           continue;
00318         }
00319 
00320         data_downloaded += evt->GetDataSize();
00321         events_downloaded++;
00322         stats.events_processed++;
00323         stats.bytes_processed += evt->GetDataSize();
00324         if(stattime>0 && time(0)-stats.last_print_time >= stattime){
00325           Message(INFO)<<stats<<std::endl;
00326           stats.Clear();
00327         }
00328       }
00329       Message(INFO)<<"Ending Run....\n";
00330       if(!reader){
00331         Message(DEBUG)<<"Processing remaining events in queue...\n";
00332         daq.EndRun();
00333         RawEventPtr evt;
00334         while((stop_events<=0 || events_downloaded < stop_events) &&
00335               daq.GetStatus() == BaseDaq::NORMAL &&
00336               (evt = daq.GetNextEvent()) && 
00337               !modules->Process(evt)){
00338           data_downloaded += evt->GetDataSize();
00339           events_downloaded++;
00340           stats.events_processed++;
00341           stats.bytes_processed += evt->GetDataSize();
00342           
00343         }
00344       }
00345       time_t delta_time = time(0)-start_time;
00346       //end the asyncronous threads
00347       for(size_t i=0; i<async_threads.size(); ++i)
00348         async_threads[i]->StopRunning();
00349       modules->Finalize();
00350       //print out some statistics
00351       Message(INFO)<<events_downloaded<<" events processed.\n";
00352       Message(INFO)<<delta_time<<" seconds elapsed.\n";
00353       if(delta_time>0){
00354         Message(INFO)<<data_downloaded<<" total bytes processed at "
00355                      <<data_downloaded/(delta_time)
00356                      <<" bytes/s\n";
00357       }
00358     }
00359   catch(std::exception &e)
00360     {
00361       std::cerr<<"Caught Exception: "<<e.what()<<"\n";
00362     }
00363   
00364   return daq.GetStatus();
00365 }
